1.question:
How do you access n'th pull for `a repository` for a particular `user-name`?
(a)https://github.com/{repo-name}/{user-name}/pull/n
(b)https://github.com/{repo-name}/{user-name}/pull=n 
(c)https://github.com/{user-name}/{repo-name}/pull=n
(d)https://github.com/{user-name}/{repo-name}/pull/n

2.question:
How do you access closed issues in the git hub for a particular user and repository?
(a)https://github.com/{user-name}/{repo-name}/issues?q=is%3Aissue+is%3Aclosed
(b)https://github.com/{user-name}/{repo-name}/issues?q=closed
(c)https://github.com/{user-name}/{repo-name}/issues?q=is%3Aclosed+is%3Aissue
(d)None of the above
